author: Hank Green
description:
Weird thing to have to make a video about but ok...

I feel the need to make a billion clarifications here, like, obviously racism is more than just the exploitation of a bias, it's a whole system of interacting things about our brains and our societies that are being exploited to control people and win power. It's just that...there's a reason it's taboo, and the weakening of that taboo is really obviously destructive in a lot of really obvious ways. I do not like where we are headed here...
title: Slavery was Racist
